Issue: Self-imposed API limits too low (TikTok: 1 call Instagram: 5 calls)
Impact: Users only getting 2-5% of requested search results
Fix Description: Change system-config defaults: max_api_calls_tiktok from 1 to 50, max_api_calls_instagram_similar from 5 to 25
Testing Required: Manual smoke test with each platform
User Benefit: Users get complete search results (1000 creators instead of 20)

Issue: No rate limiting on authentication endpoints
Impact: Brute force attacks possible on auth bypass headers
Fix Description: Implement Upstash rate limiter: 10 req/min for webhooks 5 req/min for auth
Testing Required: Automated load testing with rate limit violations

Issue: getUserProfile() does 4-way JOIN on every API request
Impact: Every API call takes 50-150ms (300ms under load)
Fix Description: Add Redis caching with 5min TTL + selective field fetching
Testing Required: Load test with 100 concurrent requests

Issue: N+1 query pattern in campaign listing
Impact: Dashboard takes 1 second to load 20 campaigns
Fix Description: Rewrite campaign query with single subquery for latest job
Testing Required: Compare query performance before/after with EXPLAIN ANALYZE

Issue: Missing indexes on scraping_jobs.user_id and campaigns.user_id
Impact: Full table scans on high-traffic queries (500ms+ for 100 jobs)
Fix Description: Add 8 composite indexes with CONCURRENTLY flag
Testing Required: Monitor slow query log for 48 hours

Issue: No timeout enforcement in QStash handler
Impact: Jobs can run indefinitely consuming resources
Fix Description: Add Promise.race with 5min timeout + check timeoutAt field
Testing Required: Simulate stuck job and verify timeout triggers
User Benefit: Users see clear "timeout" error instead of infinite loading

Issue: Job status override bug (errors marked as completed)
Impact: Users see success for failed jobs
Fix Description: Fix completion logic to preserve error status from providers
Testing Required: Test provider error propagation end-to-end
User Benefit: Users see accurate job status and error messages

Issue: Race condition in job status updates
Impact: Concurrent QStash invocations cause status flip-flopping
Fix Description: Add optimistic locking with version column
Testing Required: Run 100 concurrent job updates and verify consistency
User Benefit: Jobs never stuck in wrong state

Issue: Missing idempotency for QStash messages
Impact: Duplicate messages cause double usage tracking
Fix Description: Store and check qstashMessageId before processing
Testing Required: Send duplicate message and verify only processed once
User Benefit: Users never charged twice for same search

Issue: Continuation loop without progress check
Impact: Jobs reschedule infinitely if provider returns hasMore=true with 0 results
Fix Description: Add stall detection: exit if processedResults unchanged
Testing Required: Mock provider returning hasMore without progress

Issue: 8 routes missing authentication (getAuthOrTest)
Impact: Unauthorized access to job status and data
Fix Description: Add getAuthOrTest() + authorization checks to all routes
Testing Required: Test accessing jobs/campaigns without auth → 401

Issue: Job cleanup query has SQL syntax error
Impact: Cleanup cron never runs results table grows unbounded
Fix Description: Fix JOIN syntax in cleanup route
Testing Required: Run cleanup manually and verify results deleted

Issue: ScrapeCreators rate limit errors not distinguished
Impact: Jobs fail permanently instead of retrying
Fix Description: Add RateLimitError class + retry logic with exponential backoff
Testing Required: Mock 429 response and verify retry behavior
User Benefit: 95% fewer job failures due to transient errors

Issue: No retry logic for network failures
Impact: 1% API failure rate becomes 10% job failure rate
Fix Description: Implement withRetry() wrapper with 3 retries
Testing Required: Simulate network timeout and verify retries

Issue: Instagram US Reels partial keyword failures not tracked
Impact: Users missing data from failed keywords without knowing
Fix Description: Track per-keyword status + show warnings in UI
Testing Required: Test with 1 failing keyword out of 10

Issue: No fallback provider for Serper failures
Impact: Primary Instagram provider down = all Instagram searches fail
Fix Description: Implement cascading fallback: Serper → SerpApi → ScrapeCreators
Testing Required: Kill Serper API and verify fallback triggers

Issue: No cross-provider deduplication
Impact: Same creator appears multiple times across searches
Fix Description: Upsert to creator_profiles table with UNIQUE constraint
Testing Required: Run 2 searches for same keyword verify single entry

Issue: Onboarding modal has no close button
Impact: Users trapped in onboarding flow cannot exit
Fix Description: Add X button + onClose handler
Testing Required: Click X and verify modal closes
User Benefit: Users can exit onboarding to explore product first

Issue: Campaign list infinite retry loop
Impact: 400/401 errors trigger endless retries with loading spinner
Fix Description: Only retry on network errors (502/503/504) + show attempt count
Testing Required: Return 400 error and verify stops after 3 attempts
User Benefit: Clear error messages instead of infinite loading

Issue: Search results polling never times out
Impact: Stuck jobs cause infinite polling + memory leak
Fix Description: Add 60-poll limit (5 minutes) + show timeout message
Testing Required: Simulate stuck job and verify polling stops
User Benefit: Users see actionable error instead of spinning forever

Issue: Access guard shows flashing incorrect state
Impact: Race condition during billing data load
Fix Description: Add explicit loading state return null until loaded
Testing Required: Refresh during trial and verify no flash
User Benefit: No confusing paused messages during load

Issue: structuredConsole instead of logger (783 instances)
Impact: Logs bypass centralized system miss Sentry
Fix Description: Create codemod to replace with logger.* calls
Testing Required: Verify errors appear in Sentry after migration

Issue: QStash signature verification can be disabled in production
Impact: Attackers can forge webhooks if env var set
Fix Description: Remove SKIP_QSTASH_SIGNATURE support in production
Testing Required: Test with invalid signature in prod → 401

Issue: Auth bypass headers accepted without HMAC
Impact: Staging environments vulnerable to header injection
Fix Description: Remove x-dev-auth method keep only HMAC-signed headers
Testing Required: Test unsigned headers in staging → rejected

Issue: Race condition in checkout vs webhook
Impact: Billing state can be corrupted by timing
Fix Description: Implement distributed lock with Upstash Redis
Testing Required: Run 100 simultaneous checkout + webhook calls

Issue: Plan enforcement bypass via parallel requests
Impact: Users can exceed limits with concurrent submissions
Fix Description: Use database-level constraints + atomic increments
Testing Required: Submit 10 parallel campaign requests verify limit enforced

Issue: Missing CSRF protection
Impact: Cross-site request forgery on state-changing endpoints
Fix Description: Add CSRF middleware with token validation
Testing Required: Submit cross-origin POST verify 403

Issue: No automated test framework
Impact: Manual testing only no CI/CD integration
Fix Description: Set up Vitest + test database + GitHub Actions
Testing Required: Run npm test and verify all pass

Issue: Stripe webhook processing has zero tests
Impact: Payment failures go undetected
Fix Description: Write 15 integration tests for webhook events
Testing Required: Test duplicate webhooks trial conversion cancellation

Issue: Plan enforcement has zero tests
Impact: Billing limits may have bugs
Fix Description: Write 10 unit tests for validation logic
Testing Required: Test all limit scenarios (at limit over limit unlimited)

Issue: Memory leak in image cache
Impact: Every image lookup lists 1000 blobs never released
Fix Description: Cache results of list operation add LRU eviction
Testing Required: Monitor memory over 200 jobs verify no growth
User Benefit: No OOM crashes after sustained use

Issue: Missing timeout on 8 API routes
Impact: External API hangs cause connection leaks
Fix Description: Add AbortSignal.timeout to all fetch calls
Testing Required: Mock hanging API verify route times out

Issue: Form validation is client-side only
Impact: Server can receive invalid data
Fix Description: Add Zod schemas for all POST bodies
Testing Required: Submit invalid data verify 400 response

Issue: No character limit on brand description
Impact: Backend might truncate silently
Fix Description: Add maxLength + character counter to textarea
Testing Required: Type 1000 chars verify stops at 500

Issue: Zero state UIs not actionable
Impact: Empty campaigns shows no path to create
Fix Description: Add Create Campaign button to empty states
Testing Required: View empty list verify CTA present

Issue: Drag-and-drop has no keyboard support
Impact: Screen reader users cannot reorder list items
Fix Description: Add @dnd-kit/accessibility module
Testing Required: Use keyboard to reorder items verify works

Issue: Filter buttons missing ARIA states
Impact: Screen readers cannot detect active filter
Fix Description: Add aria-pressed to filter buttons
Testing Required: Use screen reader verify states announced
User Benefit: Screen reader users can navigate filters

Issue: Progress indicator not announced
Impact: Screen readers cannot track onboarding progress
Fix Description: Add role=progressbar with aria-valuenow
Testing Required: Use screen reader verify step announced

Issue: Inconsistent follower count data types
Impact: Some stored as 10.5K others as numbers sorting broken
Fix Description: Standardize with parseFollowerCount() util
Testing Required: Test sort by followers verify correct order

Issue: NormalizedCreator type is Record<string any>
Impact: No type safety for creator objects
Fix Description: Define strict interface with required fields
Testing Required: Add runtime validation verify catches issues

Issue: No structured job metrics in Sentry
Impact: Error logs missing context (keyword API calls etc)
Fix Description: Add structured logging at each job stage
Testing Required: Trigger error verify full context in Sentry

Issue: No real-time job dashboard
Impact: Cannot see active jobs stuck jobs queue health
Fix Description: Build admin dashboard with job statistics
Testing Required: View dashboard during load test

Issue: RapidAPI cost not tracked
Impact: Cost reports incomplete
Fix Description: Add RAPIDAPI_INSTAGRAM_COST_PER_CALL constant
Testing Required: Run search verify cost in metrics

Issue: Profile enrichment costs not separated
Impact: Cannot see breakdown of search vs enrichment
Fix Description: Track separately with different cost entries
Testing Required: View cost breakdown verify enrichment shown

Impact: Developers don't know how to run tests
Fix Description: Create comprehensive testing guide
Testing Required: New developer follows guide successfully
